name: politico
text:

name: politico
text:
Kansas GOP Rep. Steve Watkins was charged with three felony counts of voter fraud related to the 2019 municipal elections, according to court records

https://t.co/8bTlbnFZWy

name: politico
text:
Watkins, a freshman lawmaker, was charged with ‚ÄúInterference with a law enforcement officer, falsely report a felony intending to obstruct; voting without being qualified; and knowingly mark/transmit more than one advance ballot‚Äù

https://t.co/8bTlbnFZWy

name: politico
text:
Watkins also faces a misdemeanor charge of failing to tell the DMV of his address change.

Watkins has acknowledged that he used a UPS store in Topeka for his home address for a 2019 municipal election, according to the Topeka Capitol-Journal
https://t.co/8bTlbnFZWy

name: politico
text:
President Trump‚Äôs interests in yesterday's primaries went beyond politics and his grip on the Republican Party.

It was personal for Trump ‚Äî and, on that measure, he won.

Here are are five takeaways from yesterday's primaries and runoffs üëá https://t.co/jqcCadvag1

name: politico
text:
Trump won the races he cared about.

‚Ä¢ Former Auburn University head football coach Tommy Tuberville ran up the score against Jeff Sessions.
 
‚Ä¢ And Trump‚Äôs former White House physician, Ronny Jackson, won in Texas.
https://t.co/jqcCadvag1

name: politico
text: The DSCC endorsed a preferred candidate in nearly every single race that could be competitive this fall. With Sara Gideon‚Äôs win in Maine, and MJ Hegar's victory in Texas, the DSCC has swept those primaries. https://t.co/jqcCadvag1

name: politico
text:
Sara Gideon‚Äôs victory in the Maine primary made her nomination official, but she‚Äôs been running a general-election campaign against Sen. Susan Collins for the better part of a year now
https://t.co/jqcCadvag1

name: politico
text:
Even as Republicans confront a daunting electoral landscape, the Trump wing of the GOP is still growing thanks to some big safe seat wins.

In addition to wins by Tuberville and Jackson, in Alabama former state Rep. Barry Moore and Jerry Carl notched wins.
https://t.co/jqcCadvag1

name: politico
text:
As Joe Biden pushes to make Texas a presidential swing state for the first time in decades, House Democrats also see the state as the party‚Äôs most enticing expansion target for their majority, and they settled their candidate roster last night
https://t.co/jqcCadvag1

text:
